title.rendered: Virtual Office Hours for Career Services

content.rendered:
As we head into fall 2021, it’s clear that virtual will be a vital component of your student engagement strategy. To meet this need, Handshake is launching and updating a whole host of virtual solutions to help our education partners foster meaningful connections with their students.

Along the way, we want to be a resource for your teams and create space for you to talk virtual best practices with your peers. We’re relaunching our weekly office hours to talk about all things virtual—virtual fairs, virtual appointments, virtual info chats, and more. Join us weekly on Thursdays at 1pm PT / 4pm ET using the linked button below! Our final office hours session is October 14th, 2021.

Join Virtual Office Hours

Want to preview office hours content? Check out this recording of our initial office hours session on July 29, 2021.

excerpt.rendered: Join us weekly on Thursdays to ask questions and gather best practices from your peers around all things virtual—virtual fairs, virtual appointments, virtual info chats, and more!
